SELECT V.VHC_NO , V.VHC_KIND , V.VHC_TYPE , D.MAKER , D.DVC_KIND , D.DVC_TYPE , D.INST_LOC , DH.MODEL_NM FROM BM_VHC_INFO V LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_INFO D ON V.VHC_ID = D.VHC_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BM_DVC_HIST DH ON D.DVC_ID = DH.DVC_ID
DH.MODEL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%') OR V.VHC_NO LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%')
ORDER BY VHC_NO
